summary: The impossible triumph of Team Rwanda.
cast: Jonathan 'Jock' Boyer|Adrien Niyonshuti|Tom Ritchey|Nathan Byukusenge|Dan Craven|Nicodem Habiyambele|Gasore Hategeka|David Nkurunziza|Emmanuel Rudahunga|Abraham Ruhumuriza|Obed Ruvogera|Innocent Sibomana|Innocent 'Rocky' Uwamungu|Nyandwi Uwase|Jean De Dieu 'Rafiki' Uwimana|Jean-Pierre Van Zyl|Forest Whitaker
title: Rising from Ashes
